summary: This bill, the Expanding Educational Freedom and Opportunity for Families Act, aims to codify Executive Order 14191. This executive order is related to expanding educational freedom and opportunity for families. The bill specifies that the codified executive order will have the force of law. It also includes a rule of construction clarifying that the act does not affect the determination of whether private schools are subject to Title IX or are state actors. The bill was introduced in the House of Representatives and referred to committees.
